page.title: 02The Poplution of Ashby.
page.content: The population of Ashby ST.Ledgers is 110.There are 92 adults and 18 children.Their numbers by age-group are: Under 5 years old - 6 From 5 to 11 years - 7 From 11 to 16 years - 5 Clearly there are not enough children for the village to have its own school,so young children have to go to Welton primary school while older ones go to Daventry Comprehensive School. Ashby is a lovely village and most of the residents have lived there for years - not just two years,but twenty years or more.The Kirton family have been there for at least four generations. Although there is work for 25 of the adults in the village,the others have to travel to work in Daventry,or even be commuters to Rugby or London.
